metadata.feature_description: Generate and manage RSS feeds for published posts

steps.action: Navigated to Publisher Module on News page
steps.expected: Publisher module loads with posts visible
steps.actual: Publisher module loaded successfully showing Featured and Latest posts sections

steps.action: Located RSS icon in social sharing area
steps.expected: RSS icon visible alongside other social sharing icons (Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, Pinterest)
steps.actual: RSS icon (orange wave icon) visible in social sharing area at bottom of posts section

steps.action: Clicked RSS feed icon to access RSS feed
steps.expected: RSS feed page loads with valid RSS XML content
steps.actual: RSS feed generated successfully with valid RSS 2.0 XML format containing 3 posts: 'Publisher Test Post', 'Workflow Test Post - Claude Testing', 'Test Workflow Post - Submit for Review'

observations: RSS feed is enabled for the Publisher module on the News page
RSS feed generates valid RSS 2.0 XML with Atom namespace (xmlns:a10)
Feed includes channel metadata (link, language) and item details (title, link, author, description, pubDate)
RSS is disabled by default per code review (ShareSettingsManager.cs) - must be enabled in module settings
RssMaxPosts setting controls maximum posts in feed (default: 20)
